channel.title: Adding Drop
channel.description:
Okay so i have the Corporeal beast that needs a drop and Tormented Demons that need a drop, how do i add a drop? where do i go?
this is 317
thanks

item.title: Adding Drop
item.dc:creator: @Thanks Thanks
item.description:
@Thanks wrote:

317 as in Delta or PI :P…

For Delta you go to config or cfg something like that. Then go to npcdrops.cfg

Ex. npcdrop = 1 526 1 100
The first number is the npc id
The second number is the item id
The third number is how many drops
The fourth number is its percentage of drops…in this case 100%

If it’s PI I wouldn’t know because I haven’t used it.
However I think it’s in Config.java.

Read full topic
